Debrief.GUI.Tote

Class StepControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • Debrief.GUI.Tote.StepControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, Editable, StepperListener.StepperController, TimerListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AWTStepControl, SwingStepControl

    public abstract class StepControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Editable, TimerListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, StepperListener.StepperController

      • _dateFormatter

        protected final java.text.SimpleDateFormat _dateFormatter
        the date format we are using. Note, we do some wierd stuff in this. When we want to represent a date in a T-Zero style we store the text pattern (eg T+ mm:ss) in this String, knowing it may be an invalid pattern
